biotools.summary: TGS-GapCloser is a fast and accurately passing through the Bermuda in large genome using error-prone third-generation long reads.

bioschemas.name: TGS-GapCloser
bioschemas.summary: TGS-GapCloser is a fast and accurately passing through the Bermuda in large genome using error-prone third-generation long reads.

galaxy.summary: TGS-GapCloser uses error-prone long reads or preassembled contigs to fill N-gap in the genome assembly.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: TGS-GapCloser is a fast and accurately passing through the Bermuda in large genome using error-prone third-generation long reads.
